items.label: Example 1
Clusters
Gradients
items.string:
digraph G
{
    bgcolor="purple:pink"
    label="agraph"
    fontcolor="white"
    subgraph cluster1
    {
        fillcolor="blue:cyan"
        label="acluster"
        fontcolor="white"
        style="filled"
        gradientangle="270"
		node
        [
            shape=box
            fillcolor="red:yellow"
            style="filled"
            gradientangle=90
        ]
		anode
	}
}

items.label: Traffic Lights
Binary Tree
Hash Table
Example 1
items.string: graph G { n0 -- n1 -- n2 -- n3 -- n0; }

items.label: Example 2
Goose Variants (Tooltips)
items.string:
digraph ""
{
    graph
    [
        #bgcolor = lightyellow
        #rankdir = LR
        #nodesep = 0.5
    ]
    node
    [
        shape = circle
        style = filled
        #color = none
        fillcolor = red3
        fixedsize = true
        width = 0.75
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        fontsize = 36
        fontcolor = white
    ]
    edge
    [
        fontsize = 11
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        arrowsize = 0.75
    ]
    "鵝" [ tooltip = "U+9D5D 鵝" ]
    "鵞" [ tooltip = "U+9D5E 鵞" ]
    "鹅" [ tooltip = "U+9E45 鹅" ]
    "鵞" -> "鵝" [ label = " Shape \n Variant " ]
    "鵝" -> "鵞" [ label = " Semantic \n Variant " ]
    "鵝" -> "鹅" [ label = " Simplified \n Variant " ]
    "鵞" -> "鵝" [ label = " Semantic \n Variant " ]
    "鹅" -> "鵝" [ label = " Traditional \n Variant " ]
}

items.label: Goose Variants (Links)
items.string:
digraph ""
{
    graph
    [
        #bgcolor = lightyellow
        #rankdir = LR
        #nodesep = 0.5
    ]
    node
    [
        shape = circle
        style = filled
        #color = none
        fillcolor = red3
        fixedsize = true
        width = 0.75
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        fontsize = 36
        fontcolor = white
    ]
    edge
    [
        fontsize = 11
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        arrowsize = 0.75
    ]
    "鵝"
    [
        tooltip = "https://www.unicode.org/cgi-bin/GetUnihanData.pl?codepoint=9D5D"
        URL = "https://www.unicode.org/cgi-bin/GetUnihanData.pl?codepoint=9D5D"
    ]
    "鵞"
    [
        tooltip = "https://www.unicode.org/cgi-bin/GetUnihanData.pl?codepoint=9D5E"
        URL = "https://www.unicode.org/cgi-bin/GetUnihanData.pl?codepoint=9D5E"
    ]
    "鹅"
    [
        tooltip = "https://www.unicode.org/cgi-bin/GetUnihanData.pl?codepoint=9E45"
        URL = "https://www.unicode.org/cgi-bin/GetUnihanData.pl?codepoint=9E45"
    ]
    "鵞" -> "鵝" [ label = " Shape \n Variant " ]
    "鵝" -> "鵞" [ label = " Semantic \n Variant " ]
    "鵝" -> "鹅" [ label = " Simplified \n Variant " ]
    "鵞" -> "鵝" [ label = " Semantic \n Variant " ]
    "鹅" -> "鵝" [ label = " Traditional \n Variant " ]
}

items.label: Turtle Variants (Linear)
items.string:
graph ""
{
    graph
    [
        layout = dot
        rankdir = TB
    ]
    node
    [
        shape = circle
        style = filled
        fillcolor = white
        fixedsize = true
        width = 0.75
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        fontsize = 36
        fontcolor = black
    ]
    edge
    [
        fontsize = 10
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        arrowsize = 0.75
    ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+9F9C\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Unified Ideograph", style = bold ]
    "亀" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+4E80\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Unified Ideograph" ]
    "龟" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+9F9F\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Unified Ideograph" ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+F907\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Compatibility Ideograph" ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+F908\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Compatibility Ideograph" ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+FACE\nAge: Unicode 4.1 (March 2005)\nStatus: Compatibility Ideograph" ]
    "龜" -- "亀"
    "龜" -- "龟"
    "龜" -- "龜"
    "龜" -- "龜"
    "龜" -- "龜"
}

items.label: Turtle Variants (Relations)
items.string:
digraph ""
{
    graph
    [
        layout = dot
        rankdir = LR
    ]
    node
    [
        shape = circle
        style = filled
        fillcolor = white
        fixedsize = true
        width = 0.75
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        fontsize = 36
        fontcolor = black
    ]
    edge
    [
        fontsize = 10
        fontname = "system-ui, sans-serif"
        arrowsize = 0.75
    ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+9F9C\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Unified Ideograph", style = bold ]
    "亀" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+4E80\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Unified Ideograph" ]
    "龟" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+9F9F\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Unified Ideograph" ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+F907\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Compatibility Ideograph" ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+F908\nAge: Unicode 1.1 (June 1993)\nStatus: Compatibility Ideograph" ]
    "龜" [ tooltip = "Code Point: U+FACE\nAge: Unicode 4.1 (March 2005)\nStatus: Compatibility Ideograph" ]
    "龜" -> "龟" [ label = " Simplified " ]
    "龜" -> "亀" [ label = " Yasuoka " ]
    "亀" -> "龜" [ label = " Shape " ]
    "龟" -> "龜" [ label = " Traditional " ]
    "龜" -> "龜" [ label = " Unified " ]
    "龜" -> "龜" [ label = " Shape " ]
    "龜" -> "龜" [ label = " Unified " ]
    "龜" -> "龜" [ label = " Shape " ]
    "龜" -> "龜" [ label = " Unified " ]
}
